Name: VV-T149 Road Bike for Men 54cm Frame Bicycle
Description: This red bike can be used to ride comfortably in the city. The 700C wheels offer a high-speed experience of a road bike. You can easily change the gears and enjoy the speed excitement with 21 speed shifter which ensures total control in every situation.

Name: Blue Couch Throw Pillow Covers 18x18 Inch
